position: Supporting startups to  build their team | 5 Million Community of startups, Job seekers and Interns.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Helping startup companies to build their team. Building an automated HR tech that makes your slow, obsolete, and inefficient hiring process, a very convenient, quick, and satisfactory one. who have already been technically and soundly assessed by our AI-ML systems and that too for absolutely Free of cost, through Karostartup companies can choose the best interns and freshers from a large pool of skilled candidates.Managing all the Technical Recruitment and making strategies for different revenue streams.Onboarding new clients and managing delivery. Leading a team of 12 people.

experience.title: Recruitment Researcher
experience.description: I was a part of amazing Talent Acquisition team here at HuntingCube. I am driven by hiring the best talent who will help shaping the future of technology. At HuntingCube I have recruited for our clients majorly in High-Frequency Trading, E-Commerce and Product across India and Indian continent.Responsibilities-●Account management, Currentlyhandling the account of top Product Startups.● Hands-on end-to-end recruitment from sourcing to negotiatingand closing.● Sourcing potential candidates from the various sources viz,LinkedIn, naukri, database, referencing, networking and otherportals.● Post offer Identifying bottlenecks and optimizing therecruitment process.

experience.title: Human Resources Specialist
experience.description: Responsible for end to end recruitment cycle right from searching/sourcing and screening resumes to short-listing candidates, coordinating, & conducting interviews and negotiating till final offer. Sourcing through Job portals, Candidate references, Database, Networking, Head Hunting, Cold calling etc. Conducting and coordinating recruitment drives PAN India.

experience.title: Event Head
experience.description: House For Indian Entrepreneurs Foundation is a Not For Profit organization and is an initiative by alumni (IIT's and IIM's). the objective of HIE is to bring together all Aspiring Entrepreneurs from India as well as worldwide under one common platform to network, socialize, share ideas, learnings & Discussion on opportunities in Entrepreneurial sector.
